Reporter sending the report by mail.

MailReporter

public MailReporter()
Method Detail

configure

public void configure(Properties configuration)
Configures the Mail Reporter. The given configuration must contain the ANDROLOG_REPORTER_MAIL_ADDRESS property and it must be a valid email address.

Specified by:
configure in interface Reporter
Parameters:
configuration - the Androlog configuration.
See Also:
Reporter.configure(java.util.Properties)

send

public boolean send(android.content.Context context,
                    String mes,
                    Throwable err)
If the reporter was configured correctly, post the report to the set e-mail address. IF the mail cannot be sent (no mail client), the method returns false

Specified by:
send in interface Reporter
Parameters:
context - the Android context
mes - a message (optional)
err - a error to attach to the report (optional)
Returns:
true if the report was sent correctly, false otherwise.
See Also:
Reporter.send(android.content.Context, java.lang.String, java.lang.Throwable)
